org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.commit

Class CommitUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.commit.CommitUtils

  • public final class CommitUtils
extends Object
    Static utility methods related to S3A commitment processing, both staging and magic. Do not use in any codepath intended to be used from the S3AFS except in the committers themselves.

    • Method Summary

        Returns:

      • getS3AFileSystem

        public static S3AFileSystem getS3AFileSystem(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                             org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                             boolean magicCommitRequired)
                                      throws PathCommitException,
                                             IOException
        Get the S3A FS of a path.
        Parameters:
        path - path to examine
        conf - config
        magicCommitRequired - is magic complete required in the FS?
        Returns:
        the filesystem
        Throws:
        PathCommitException - output path isn't to an S3A FS instance, or if magicCommitRequired is set, if doesn't support these commits.
        IOException - failure to instantiate the FS
